DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy stability AT TORBI 709M 4-haptic toric IOL cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Efficacy Stability AT TORBI 709M 4-haptic Toric IOL Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion 1. senile cataract 2. patient ' age 21 year old 3. preoperative regular corneal astigmatism 1.00 D 6.00 D Exclusion criterion 1. pregnant , lactate woman 2. presence ocular disease affect stability lens capsule Primary outcome : efficacy index ( visual acuity , refractive result Secondary outcome : rotational stability , endothelial cell count , cornea thickness
DOC.criteria: senile cataract patient ' age 21 year older preoperative regular corneal astigmatism 1.00 D 6.00 D pregnant , lactate woman presence ocular disease affect stability lens capsule
